name: Monkey D. Luffy
text: DON!! x2 Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may discard one card from your hand; if your life is at 0 cards, you may add up to 2 5 cost characters from your hand or trash to your life face up.

effect.text: You may discard one card from your hand; if your life is at 0 cards, you may add up to 2 5 cost characters from your hand or trash to your life face up.

meta.notes: Per the rules, your face up life cards will be sent to the bottom of your deck instead of to your hand.
